title: Best of The Program | 12/4/20
description:
Restaurant owners have had enough of the lockdowns, and they’re speaking out. A fed-up California chef explains why banning outdoor dining is ludicrous. Discovery announced its own streaming service, and Warner Bros. will release movies simultaneously in theaters and on HBO Max. Jeffy joins Pat and Stu to talk all the movies that will finally be released. Joe Biden insists that we cancel our travel plans this Christmas, but once again predicts an outrageously high number of COVID deaths if we don’t.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
